simula.compiler.statement

Class ConditionalStatement

  • java.lang.Object
    • simula.compiler.SyntaxClass
      • simula.compiler.statement.Statement
        • simula.compiler.statement.ConditionalStatement

  • public final class ConditionalStatement
extends Statement
    Conditional Statement. 
     
 Syntax:
 
   ConditionalStatement = Ifclause { Label : } ForStatement
                        | Ifclause { Label : } UnconditionalStatement  [ ELSE Statement ]
     Ifclause = IF BooleanExpression THEN
